Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.developmentcard

Class DevelopmentCardsBoard

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.developmentcard.DevelopmentCardsBoard
public class DevelopmentCardsBoard
extends java.lang.Object
3 rows-4 columns grid of Development card from which all players can purchase cards during a match.

  • Method Summary
